amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Secretary of Defense from using any funds authorized to the department for the transfer or release of Guantanamo detainees to Yemen.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to prohibit the Secretary of Defense from using any funds authorized to the department for the transfer or release of Guantanamo detainees to Yemen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 188 (Roll no. 236).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 188 (Roll no. 236).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mrs. Walorski.
